name: Mancala Voice
description:
Mancala Voice is an accessible version of the classic board game Mancala for iPhone and iPad. It is designed for both vision impaired and sighted players and can be played by one or two players. Mancala Voice is fully integrated with Apple’s VoiceOver technology.

Mancala Voice has been programmed entirely by Freerange Future mobile developer, Tim Carter, a young vision impaired man.
